EmailTemplate.textOnly:
110 Clean false false false EN-US X-NONE X-NONE Sounds good, I’ll activate both of your accounts once I get your I9 and photo copy/picture of your Passport.
Be sure to follow the example of the I9 on the page before the actual I9. If the signatures are in the wrong spot, I have to get you to re-do it – which can be a pain.
Regards,
Steve
From: Ed Newman [mailto:newmaed@gmail.com] Sent: Monday, December 19, 2011 2:24 PM To: Steve Arhancet Subject: Re: MSA for Angie
Steve - I told Linda to go ahead and get started with Angie, I will have my I-9 to you tonight or tomorrow.
Thanks, Ed

Thanks,
Linda

Steve

On Dec 15, 2011, at 7:12 PM, Steve Arhancet <sarhancet@mbopartners.com> wrote: Kerri,
I received your contact information from Linda. Look forward to working with you to complete this contracting process for Angie a new consultant with your organization.
Regards,
Steve ___________________________________ Steve Arhancet Director, Consultant Services MBO Partners

From: Steve Arhancet Sent: Wednesday, December 14, 2011 1:01 PM To: 'Ed Newman'; Linda Brenner Subject: RE: MSA for Angie
Linda,
On behalf of everyone here at MBO Partners, we look forward to working with you and your organization.
MBO Partners is a corporate platform for consultants who find their own work and engagements. With over 20 years of experience administering professional contract workers, we understand the complexities of co-employment and 1099 risk. We mitigate tax-related contractor risks by making it easy for independent consultants to take advantage of our W-2 employment program. Through our program, they gain access to group benefits as well as a full suite of business processing services. We carry comprehensive business insurances, including General Liability, Errors and Omissions, and Workers’ Compensations policies that all our Associates are covered under. If you would like a more in-depth view of our services, please visit http://info.mbopartners.com/rs/mbo/images/MBO_Partners_Introduction.pdf.
Attached is the standard agreement and SOW we use when engaging our Associates with their clients. Please review and complete it, and return a signed copy to me. And, please do not hesitate to contact me if you have any questions.
Regards,
Steve ___________________________________ Steve Arhancet Director, Consultant Services MBO Partners
t: 703.793.6011 f: 703.793.6081 m: 540.560.8837 e: sarhancet@mbopartners.com w: www.mbopartners.com

Linda - I am cc'ing STeve Arhancet from MBO Partners on this email. He will be in touch with you today to set up the MSA contract for Angie's services at $80/hour.
Thanks, Ed
